Race.SpecificTitle: Parishwide Proposition -- 1.21 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of LaSalle, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a one and twenty-one hundredths (1.21) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the Parish (an estimated $108,700 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2024 and ending with the year 2033, for the purpose of maintaining, operating, constructing and support all of public health services under the supervision of the LaSalle Parish Health Unit?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road District No. 2 -- 7.54 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 2, LaSalle Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a seven and fifty-four hundredths (7.54) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $68,900 expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2024 and ending with the year 2033, for the purpose of purchasing equipment, equipment upkeep, road and bridge construction, drainage and road maintenance for the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road District No. 8 -- 7.17 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 8, LaSalle Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a seven and seventeen hundredths (7.17) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $139,000 expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2024 and ending with the year 2033, for the purpose of purchasing equipment, equipment upkeep, road and bridge construction, drainage and road maintenance for the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road District No. 10 -- 7.00 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 10, LaSalle Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a seven (7.00) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $16,900 expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2024 and ending with the year 2033, for the purpose of road and bridge construction and maintenance for the District, title to which shall be in the public?

Race.SpecificTitle: Recreation District No. 22 -- 6.42 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Recreation District No. 22 of the Parish of LaSalle, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy a six and forty-two hundredths (6.42) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $135,000 expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2024 and ending with the year 2033, for the purpose of equipping, maintaining and operating recreational facilities in the District?
